articles.title: Bruce Willis' wife, Emma Heming, 'grateful' for love after aphasia diagnosis - Page Six
articles.description: The actor’s family announced Wednesday that he would be “stepping away” from his career due to the condition, which affects the ability to communicate.
articles.content:
Bruce Willis’ wife, Emma Heming, thanked fans for their outpouring of love after announcing the actor was diagnosed with aphasia.
“your love, support, compassion, prayers really help. I’m grateful. … [+2228 chars]

articles.title: Razzies rescinds Bruce Willis's 'worst performance' award after aphasia diagnosis - The Washington Post
articles.description: The Razzies rescinded the “worst performance” award given to Bruce Willis following the announcement that he has been diagnosed with aphasia.
articles.content: But days after the Razzies handed out the award, Williss family announced that the star was stepping away from acting after he was diagnosed with aphasia, a condition that can affect a persons abilit… [+3335 chars]

articles.title: Scientists finally reveal the first complete human genome - Lifestyle Asia India
articles.description: A team from the Telomere-to-Telomere (T2T) Consortium, comprising 100 scientists, has succeeded in sequencing the complete human genome.
articles.content: Nineteen years ago, the groundbreaking Human Genome Project study sequenced 92 percent of the human genome. However, scientists had been struggling to decipher the remaining eight percent. Now, a tea… [+2104 chars]

articles.description: The actor was nominated eight times for the special category "Worst Performance by Bruce Willis in a 2021 Movie". His family announced earlier this week that he had been diagnosed with aphasia and was retiring.
